mdRecord.dcterms:title: Plan / D'York en Virginie, / avec les attaques et les Campemens / de I'Armee combinee de France / et d'Amerique
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From François Soulés,, Histoire de troubles de l'Amerique anglaise, 4 vols., (Paris, Buisson, 1783), vol. 3, at end. On light blue paper, the plan is oriented with north to the right. Relief is shown by hachures. Includes roads and houses. British defense fortifications at Yorktown and Gloucester are shown as well as those of the French and American forces. --From This New Founde Lande: The Henry & Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College, 2008.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Soulés, François, 1748-1809
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Maps
Chesapeake Bay Region (Md. and Va.)
Maps--Early works to 1800
Cartographic materials
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Henry and Kaye Spalding Map Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Henry and Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College; Image appears on pg. 53 (plate 28) of This New Founde Land, Hampden-Sydney College, Virginia, 2008
